summary: Manager Research & Development at PharmaPartners. Member of the Management Team (Business Unit Pharmacy Groups), responsible for the Research & Development team and Portfolio team, P&L responsible and leading a team of professionals (30 FTE) and an external development team (15 FTE).

treasury_media.title: PharmaPartners verbindt voor verbetering
treasury_media.description: PharmaPartners bouwt al meer dan veertig jaar zorgsystemen. Voor huisartsen, huisartsenposten en openbare apotheken binnen de eerstelijn. Omdat wij ervan overtuigd zijn dat je samen meer bereikt dan alleen, maken we ICT die verbindt.

education.field_of_study: Information & Communication Technology (majored in Business Administration)

awards.title: Nominated for the HZ-Stern award
awards.description: Nominated for the HZ-Stern award with my thesis “Portals & Collaboration” (Hogeschool Zeeland, 2007).

projects.title: Hosting & System Administration Team
projects.description: Manager of NetMatch' hosting & system administration team. Responsible for our hosting services, supplier/partner management, service level agreements, and daily coordination of the system administration team.

projects.title: TUI Cruises - Business Intelligence
projects.description:
Project Manager for the Business Intelligence project at TUI Cruises. 

In this project we're delivering a Business Data Warehouse which uses data from the CRM system, DaVinci system and various sources. On top of the Business Data Warehouse, TUI Cruises has various cubes and reporting to use the data for management reporting.

projects.title: TUI Cruises - Digital Unit
projects.description:
Starting-up the new TUI Cruises Digital Unit. A new unit within TUI Cruises who is responsible for all digital and guest facing projects. In this unit I'm having the roles of Digital Lead (June 2018 - present) and Digital Planner (June 2018 - February 2019). 

NetMatch is working closely together with TUI Cruises, and two digital agencies (Cellular, Yours Truly) to make the digital transformation a success.

projects.title: TUI Cruises - Marketing Automation
projects.description:
In the Marketing Automation project, TUI Cruises is sending transactional emails to prospects and customers for upcoming cruises, bookable ancillary services, etc.
NetMatch is delivering the customer feeds, cruise inventory feeds and ancillary inventory feeds to be used by TUI Cruises to send the right email at the right time.

projects.title: TUI Cruises - Middleware
projects.description:
TUI Cruises is a German cruise operator and became a client of NetMatch in 2008. Over the last years, NetMatch delivered several solutions at TUI Cruises like the internet booking engine, My Client environment / customer portal and a Business Intelligence solution (data warehouse, cubes).

In January 2014 we've started a project called "Middleware". In this project we're implementing a middleware application which connects various back-office systems with the web front-ends on both the Mein Schiff cruise ships and for the travellers at home.

projects.title: TUI Cruises - Search & Booking API
projects.description: NetMatch is delivering Search and Booking API's to the Digital Agencies to support the cruise search on the tuicruises.com website and cruise booking on the IBE.

projects.title: Timatic Test Tool - IATA Data Publications Netherlands
projects.description:
NetMatch developed a web application for IATA Data Publications Netherlands on the Timatic database to test Timatic requests/responses via several interfaces (forms, xml, ...) in order to evaluate data quality.

About Timatic:
Timatic is the industry standard used by airlines and travel agents to verify passengers travel document requirements for their destination and any transit points. Airlines use this information to ensure their customers are compliant with border control rules and regulations. Timatic delivers personalized information based on the passenger's destination, transit points, nationality, travel document, residence country etc.

projects.title: TUI Cruises - Middleware roll-out new Mein Schiff
projects.description: Middleware roll-out to the new Mein Schiff 2 (maiden voyage in Q1 2019)

projects.title: TUI Cruises - Middleware roll-out new Mein Schiff
projects.description: Middleware roll-out to the new Mein Schiff 1 (maiden voyage in May 2018)

projects.title: TUI Cruises - Online Check-in
projects.description:
The goal of the online check-in project is to improve the customer experience in regards to embarkation process on the first day of the cruise.

In this project we’ve implemented self-service check-in from home via the “Meine Reise” guest portal (incl. printing of boarding passes), introduced a fast-lane at the port to access the ship faster, and support “early cabin release” so a client can benefit from the cabin when it’s ready instead of waiting until 15:00 for the general release.

projects.title: Hapag Lloyd Cruises - Booking API for OTA's
projects.description: Implemented a Booking API for OTAs (Online Travel Agents) for Hapag Lloyd Cruises which includes a full integration with the DaVinci back-office system.

projects.title: TUI Cruises - Internet Booking Engine
projects.description:
Implemented "Cruise Search API" and "Booking API" on top of the back-office systems of TUI Cruises. 

All business logic needed to search and book a cruise –from various back-office systems and web services – is incorporated in these API’s. The API’s support cabin selection, flights services, train and bus services, online payment and online booking. 

Our ease-to-use Cruise Search API and Booking API are now used by digitial agencies to build the new tuicruises.com webplatform.

projects.title: Albatros Travel - Internet Booking Engine
projects.description: Implementing a new Internet Booking Engine which includes a full integration with the DaVinci back-office system and NETS payment solution. Project launched early 2015.

projects.title: Albatros Travel - new website for 4 markets
projects.description:
Albatros Travel offers quality travel since 1986. From African safaris and Arctic cruises to Adventure Marathons and Asian odysseys, Visit their website: www.albatros-travel.dk

NetMatch developed the Albatros websites for the Danish, Norwegian, Swedish and Finnish markets. This includes the web concept, web development, new content management system (DESK), search & guided navigation (Endeca).

projects.title: Travelhouse - website
projects.description:
Travelhouse, a core brand of Hotelplan Suisse, represents specialist brands (africantrails, falcontravel, inditours, salinatours, skytours, wettstein). Visit their website: http://www.travelhouse.ch

Reference case: Travelhouse generates more website traffic via organic search
http://netmatch.nl/en/cases/travelhouse-generates-more-website-traffic-via-organic-search/

projects.title: Zoover - dynamic packaging
projects.description:
Zoover is one of the largest independent travel review website in Europe. The site now has over a 1,5 million reviews on accommodations, destinations and points of interests illustrated with thousands of holiday photos and videos added by Zoover users. 

On the zoover.nl website we've implemented a dynamic packaging solution based on peakwork Player-Hub technology with connection to several hotel providers and airlines.

projects.title: Migros-Ferien
projects.description: Migros Ferien is part of the Hotelplan Group and sells simple mostly predefined packages focusing on budget beach holidays and all-inclusive resorts. Visit their website: http://www.migros-ferien.ch

projects.title: Vacando
projects.description: Vacando is a web portal offering holiday homes situated all over the world with a focus on Europe. Various suppliers and private owners present their holiday houses here. Visit their website: http://www.vacando.ch

projects.title: Secretsline Hotels
projects.description:
Secretsline Hotels offers a choice of holidays in selected exclusive villas, residences and hotels. 

NetMatch developed the Secretsline website including booking flow and online payment. Unfortunately the brand Secretsline was closed down at mid 2013 and therefore this project ended.

profile_positions.description:
Manager Research & Development at PharmaPartners. Member of the Management Team (Business Unit Pharmacy Groups), responsible for the Research & Development team and Portfolio team, P&L responsible and leading a team of professionals (30 FTE) and an external development team (15 FTE).

PharmaPartners supports pharmacies with software for their core business operations. We help pharmacists to work efficiently while always guarding the patient’s safety. Our software optimizes operational processes, supports each patient individually with their choice of medicine and medication usage, and supports cooperation between colleagues and prescribers.
profile_positions.title: Manager Research & Development

profile_positions.description:
Delivery Manager and Senior Project Manager for NetMatch Travel Technology Solutions. Managing 3 Kanban team (20 team members) and the system administration & hosting team (7 team members). 

Having a focus on the cruise industry. Currently working for TUI Cruises (Germany), Hapag Lloyd Cruises (Germany) and IATA Netherlands Data Publications (The Netherlands).
profile_positions.title: Delivery Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project Manager for NetMatch clients in Denmark, Germany, The Netherlands, Switzerland and Italy. 

The clients I worked for are: Albatros Travel (Denmark), Zoover, IATA (The Netherlands), TUI Cruises (Germany), Hotelplan Group, Interhome Group (Switzerland) and Hotelplan Italy, Secretsline Hotels (Italy). For these clients I'm responsible for the project management and requirement analysis.

My main activities: project management, project planning, manage development teams, write project proposals and project plans, pre-sales and workshops, account management, requirements analysis and advice clients about their web presence, new wishes and business requirements.

In 2013, my job responsibilities were extended with the daily management of the system administration team, recruitment of new employees (.net developers, front-end developers, system administrators), coaching and training of junior requirements engineers, developers and interns.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
In my role as Project Manager, I managed SharePoint projects for clients in the healthcare, food & beverages, logistics and production industry as well as projects for several Dynamics NAV partners.

The projects were based on the SharePoint 2007 and SharePoint 2010 platform on which we built intranet, extranet and internet solutions for our clients. In most projects, the integration with the Dynamics NAV back-office system was an important aspect.

My main activities: project management, project planning, communicate progress and metrics, write project proposals and project plans, assuring customer satisfaction and securing follow-up work.

Some of the clients I worked for are: MEE West-Brabant, Bosman Medische Hulpmiddelen, Coroos Conserven, Best Fresh Group and Koole Transport.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
As ECM Consultant at Thysia Information Management, my primary focus was implementing intranet, extranet and internet solutions based on the SharePoint platform. 

In most of the SharePoint projects I was involved as lead consultant during the implementation, starting from the very first contact with the client until the successful implementation and training of the end-users. 

This means my work started during the presales phase giving product demonstrations to prospects, building Proof of Concepts (POC) and writing project proposals. During the design and implementation phases of the project, my work continued with requirements analysis, writing functional and technical designs, implementing and configuring SharePoint solutions, implementation communication interfaces between Dynamic NAV and SharePoint, end-user training and support.

Some of the clients I worked for are: Eosta, Eco-Point, Market Food Group, Best Fresh Group, DIN Solutions, Kersten Revalidatie Techniek and Koole Tanktransport.
profile_positions.title: ECM Consultant

profile_positions.description:
SharePoint; Implementation of SharePoint portals and solutions, with a real-time Dynamic NAV communication interface, for clients of Schouw Informatisering. Involved in the information analyses, implementation and end-user training. 

Business Intelligence; Pre-sales, end-user training and consultancy for ExSION Reporting.  ExSION Reporting is an Excel-based reporting tool to make financial and management reports directly on the Dynamics NAV ERP system.
profile_positions.title: Business Intelligence & SharePoint Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Research on the added value for customers in the food & beverages branch, when integrating Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 in combination with Microsoft Dynamics NAV. Also called: Composite Applications.

Next to this research, I’ve also built a “Proof of Concept” on the above mentioned scenario. In this proof of concept, three possible solutions where tested. Two of these eventually established a connection between SharePoint and Dynamics NAV.
profile_positions.title: Trainee

profile_positions.description: As interim Business Systems Officer, I was responsible for the system management and user support for Budelpack Poortvliet B.V.
profile_positions.title: Business Systems Officer (interim)

profile_positions.description:
In a project granted by the European Union, I´ve (together with six other students) developed a generic methodology for controlling the after-sales process of an IT-organization. 

As basis for this methodology, I’ve used parts from ITIL (Information Technology Infrastructure Library) and COBIT (Control Objectives for Information and related Technology).
profile_positions.title: Project Member

profile_positions.description:
Developed and implemented a web application for the department Quality Assurance to support registering and tracing of products with quality deviations. 

Wrote the functional and technical design for the web application, developed the application itself and implemented it in two plants.
profile_positions.title: Trainee

volunteer_experiences.description:
Member of the Rekenkamercommissie (EN: audit committee) of the municipality of Steenbergen. 

The audit committee conducts independent research and makes recommendations to the city council. With our research, the committee wants to contribute to the quality of municipal policy and management. The research reports can be viewed publicly on the website of the municipality of Steenbergen.

Involved in the following researches:
 - UN disability convention (NL: VN-verdrag handicap) (2019)
 - Citizen participation (NL: Kerngericht werken in Steenbergen) (2020)
 - Sustainability (NL: Duurzaamheid) (2020)
 - Notifications Public Space (NL: Meldingen Openbare Ruimte (MOR)) (2021)
 - Government Information Act (NL: Wet Openbaarheid van Bestuur) (2021)
 - Privacy & Information Security (NL: Privacy & Informatiebeveiliging) (2021)
 - Corona support fund (NL: Corona steunfonds) (2022)
Secretary at "Schietvereniging Nieuw-Vossemeer". The association was founded in August 1965 and we practice crossbow shooting on a 20 meter course.
Chairman for a local political party in the municipality of Steenbergen (NL).

Guiding a “travel company” case for the bachelor ICT & Software Engineering at Fontys University of Applied Sciences in Eindhoven. My role is to act as client for the project teams.

The goal of the project is to deliver an online application (preferably a web application) for a travel company. The programming language for the project is Java.
Guest Lecturer E-Business for the Bachelor Information & Communication Technology
Member Professional Field Advisory Committee (NL: beroepenveldcommissie) for the bachelor Logistics Management
